sourcesContent:
<template>
    <v-app>

      <Navbar
        :activePlatform="activePlatform"
        />
      <v-container style="width: 1012px; height: 100%" class="teal lighten-5">
          <router-view
            :key="$route.fullPath"
            @platform-activated="setActivePlatform($event)"/>
        </v-container>
    </v-app>
</template>

<script type="text/javascript">
import Navbar from "@/components/Navbar.vue"
import { mapGetters } from "vuex";
import {
  USER_FETCH
} from "@/store/actions.type";

  export default {
    name: "App",
    data() {
      return {
        activePlatform: {},
      }
    },
    components: {
      Navbar
    },
    computed: {
      ...mapGetters(["activeUser"]),
    },
    methods: {
      setUserInfo() {
        this.$store.dispatch(USER_FETCH)
      },
      setActivePlatform(platform){
        this.activePlatform = platform;
      }
    },
    created() {
      this.setUserInfo();
    }
  }
</script>
